title: API Key Scopes & MCP Activity Dashboard
bullets: API keys now support fine-grained scopes — restrict keys to read-only or write access per vault section
New MCP Usage dashboard widget shows daily and weekly request counts at a glance
Per-key request activity log lets you audit which tools are using each key
UI scope selector makes it easy to configure key permissions when creating or editing keys

title: Entry Editing, Selective Export & Import UX
bullets: Full entry editing is now available directly in the Entry Inspector panel
Selective export lets you filter entries by category, kind, and date range before downloading
Free-tier users see a clear upgrade prompt when attempting large exports
Import flow now includes inline format documentation and a progress bar for JSON imports
Delete entries with a 5-second undo window before the change is committed

title: Hosted MCP & Session-Based Auth
bullets: Context Vault now runs a hosted MCP server — connect Claude Code, Cursor, Windsurf, and Zed with one command
Authentication switched to HttpOnly session cookies for improved security
Onboarding flow branches between new users and teams migrating from a local vault
Import bridge syncs your local vault folder directly into the hosted vault on first sign-in

title: Billing & Free Tier Refinements
bullets: Stripe prices updated to match GTM pricing; free tier limits revised to reflect launch strategy
Pro subscribers can now access the Stripe Customer Portal directly from the Billing page
Billing page feature copy aligned with actual backend limits to remove confusion
OAuth sign-in now reliably issues tokens for returning users, fixing a lockout regression

title: Import, Search & Error States
bullets: Folder upload is now the primary import workflow — drag in your vault directory and everything syncs
Import promoted to a first-class sidebar route for easier discoverability
Error states across the app now show actionable retry buttons and reconnect options
Pre-production security hardening: logout data leak patched, webhook TOCTOU fixed, invite expiry enforced
